title: Spoon, 1985-103-163, ca. 1800–1900
creditline: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg
description: Oval-shaped spoon bowl, rattail on back of bowl. Curved and facetted neck flaring on the sides. Conical silver ferrule. Ivory handle carved in deep relief. Three putti, one of them kneeling, the other two standing on his shoulders, holding each other by the hand.

exhibitions.title: Feeding Desire: Design and the Tools of the Table, 1500-2005
